sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry_info (inquiry_date, mem_id, company_name, company_media_name, company_user_name, user_name, user_mailadd, tel_num, title_id, inquiry_type, inquiry_kind_code, inquiry_object, inquiry_contents, response_date, response_subject, response_contents, from_subject, from_mailadd, reply_to, correspond_status, correspond_user_id, correspond_user_name, created_date, created_user, last_update_date, last_update_user) VALUES (#inquiryDate#, #memId#, #companyName#, #companyMediaName#, #companyUserName#, #userName#, #userMailadd#, #telNum#, #titleId#, #inquiryType#, #inquiryKindCode#, #inquiryObject#, #inquiryContents#, #responseDate#, #responseSubject#, #responseContents#, #fromSubject#, #fromMailadd#, #replyTo#, #correspondStatus#, #correspondUserId#, #correspondUserName#, #createdDate#, #createdUser#, #lastUpdateDate#, #lastUpdateUser#)
